info.name: Allan
info.description: ALLAN is an example of perfect design, where the designer bears in mind the basic functions of this piece of furniture – comfort and beauty. Despite its unique shape, this armchair will still surprise you with the harmony and comfort of using it. Its seat is tilted, producing the effect of an armchair “frozen” for a moment before falling. The line of its wooden armrests has been so designed as to give stability to the shape. ALLAN – unruly in form.
